title: Made Anime Great Again!
review: Well,I am no critique but this movie is one of the best i have ever seen!Story-9/10Well i would have given it a 10 but the basic concept is not very original but i will say this the way it is presented prepare your mind to be Blown.Characters-10/10 Well a Movie this Great Must Have Awesome Characters Specially the main Characters which i see rare these days.Animation-10/10 See it from Your Eyes.Overall-10/10 This Movie Is A great ride All I say You Will Enjoy it from the Start to Finish.
